channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co Sale
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Phase Eight Sale
channel.desc: Tune in and discover unmissable sale prices on chic Phase Eight designs, so you can update your wardrobe for the season and make fabulous savings.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off White Stuff
channel.desc: Up to 50% off White Stuff.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion On Friday with Izabel
channel.desc: Tune in and discover trendy fashion with Izabel London. Whether you're shopping for a holiday, wedding or your daily wardrobe, we'll be showcasing pieces that'll help you feel your fashionable best.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Sleepwear
channel.desc: Upgrade your nightwear collection this summer with our fabulous selection. From cosy pyjamas to stylish nightdresses and robes, we've got you covered this season.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi Sale
channel.desc: Bag yourself some fabulous fashion deals with Ben de Lisi, who offers style staples that encapsulate modern elegance, from stunning dresses to chic separates. Discover what's on offer in this show.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: YouGarden
channel.desc: Discover beautiful plants and all the garden essentials you need, from You Garden.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Michael Perry's Garden
channel.desc: Join QVC's resident gardening expert Michael Perry with his stunning selection of plants and all the tools you could need, plus attractive decorations for a finishing touch.
